text: Join us as we delve into monitoring JavaScript variable changes using getters and setters.
This guide shows how to use object.defineProperty to keep an eye on variable changes.
By setting up getters and setters, you can see when and how your variables are modified,
even within object methods. It also offers reusable functions for straightforward implementation
and covers how to subscribe and unsubscribe from notifications.
Curious to learn more? Check out the details below.
